###data frame examples

```{r}
Names <- c("Ang","Ana", "Nori")
Age<- c(23,24,28)
gender<-c("f","f","f")

data<-data.frame(Names, Age, gender)

```
```{r}
# Create dataframe
a <- c(1,2,3,2,3,4,5,4)
b <- c(4,3,4,3,2,1,2,3)
plot_df <- data.frame(a,b)

# basic scatterplot
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x=a,y=b))+
  geom_point()
```
